Text:
Uploader here,

If you download this torrent, watch a few of the episodes and make a comment.

It was an enormous pain in the ass to put this collection together.
very nice.just watched the first season and was very surprised at the quality.DVD rip?regardless great work collecting these.many many thanks.

Oh man I wish this was seeding enough for me to actually download it!! I love this show. I'll pay you money to send it to me.

Congrats on pulling it all together.
